description: Back Country Prefabricated Shelters for Akami-Uapishk?-KakKasuak-Mealy Mountains National Park Reserve.

# Government Tender Announcement

## 5P131-230171 Back Country Prefabricated Shelters – Parks Canada

### Notice Details

*   **Notice Reference Number**: WS4363976509-Doc4365100805
*   **Amendment Number**: 2
*   **Publication Date**: December 22, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date**: January 17, 2024 at 14:00:00
*   **Amendment Date**: January 17, 2024
*   **Expected Contract Start Date**: February 1, 2024
*   **Expected Contract End Date**: Not Specified
*   **Tender Status**: Expired

### Procurement Details

*   **Procurement Category**: Goods and Services
*   **Procurement Method**: Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Notice Type**: Request for Proposal
*   **Trade Agreements**: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

### Contracting Entity and End User

*   **Contracting Entity**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
    *   **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC, K1A 0S5, Canada
*   **End User Entity**: Parks Canada Agency (PC)
    *   **Address**: 30 Victoria Street, Gatineau, QC, J8X 0B3, Canada

### Contact Information

*   **Contact Name**: Genevieve Petten (SPAC/PSPC)
*   **Contact Email**: [genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:genevieve.petten@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   **Attachment URL**: [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18347599?extsite=MTgzNDc1OTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18347599?extsite=MTgzNDc1OTlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Tender Description

Parks Canada is seeking to acquire eight (8) prefabricated back country shelter accommodations for Akami-Uapishk?-KakKasuak-Mealy Mountains National Park Reserve. Bidders may request a debrief
